entry.title: Sines of Life 71: Kaleidoscope (Livestream #04)
entry.content:
By popular demand, last Fridayâ€™s Quarantine Livestream is now consumable as this monthâ€™s Sines of Life Radio! It feels a bit like cheating to turn a live set into the monthly mixtape, but Iâ€™m puttinâ€™ in the work either way, so you might as well get both flavors ðŸ˜‰

Lotâ€™s of extended transitions, giving the whole set a semi-mashup vibe. Eclectic as always, weâ€™ve got Jason Ross, Rita Ora, London Grammar, a pair of feel-good tracks from RAC, and much more.

You can also check out the Video Replay of Livestream #04 if you want the full show.

Enjoy, and turn it upâ€¦

Download this mix.

Missed the Livestream? No sweat â€“ head over to my YouTube Channel where you can (re)watch me workinâ€™ for those sound waves. Plus, sign-up for my new VIP Mailing List at vip.lifesinemusic.com to receive updates and announcements for all future events and streams!

entry.title: Sines of Life 69: Stir Crazy
entry.content:
A little something to keep you dancing in your living rooms, which is just about the only place any of us are dancing at present. This oneâ€™s got some fun, some funk, and a whole lot of catchy vocals, coming at you from a wide array of artists including Kaskade, Sam Smith, JackLNDN, Tinlicker, and many more. I even snuck one in from Carly Rae to keep the fiancÃ© happy.

Be good to each other, enjoy, and turn it upâ€¦ oh, and wash your hands (weâ€™ll look back and laugh at this later.. I hope)

Download this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 68: We Are What We Do

link.title: Sines of Life 68: We Are What We Do

entry.content:
Quite the collection of personal favorites in this monthâ€™s roster of featured artists. We find ourselves both opening and closing this episode with songs from Lane 8â€™s latest and unsurprisingly triumphant new artist album, plus a dyad of refreshed 80â€™s classics thanks to Above & Beyond and Shane 54 respectively putting a modern twist onto two old favorites. Sprinkle in the likes of Marsh, Spencer Brown, Dezza, and something new-ish from Mat Zo and youâ€™re in for more than one treat.

Enjoy, and turn it upâ€¦

Download this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 67: Hot & Cold
entry.content:
A story of exploration, infatuation, paradise lost, and acceptanceâ€¦ â€˜Hot & Coldâ€™ takes you on a relationship roller coaster in audio form. Whether youâ€™re looking to crank up the heat with instant earworms from Lizzo, David Guetta, and Phoebe Ryan, or cool things down a notch with the mellow stylings of Shallou and Qrion, this storytime mix has got something for you.

Not quite a BackTrack, but I found myself craving some old-school Benassi, so Iâ€™m sure youâ€™ll all recognize his timeless â€˜Beautiful Peopleâ€™ in the final act. Enjoy, and turn it upâ€¦

Download this mix.
